opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Baze v. REES, COMM'R, KY DOC

opinion:
(2008)

RALPH BAZE, ET AL.
v.
REES, COMM'R, KY DOC, ET AL.

No. 07-5439

Supreme Court of United States.

January 4, 2008.

The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted.
